name: Name Pointer
comment: Pointers to character names. This set is used for the default names during character creation, but there are other copies in ROM, not sure where or how they're used.
The spell set and spell level structures are interlaced. Possibly a joint struct, but they have separate indexes.

name: Spell Routine?
comment: Table of pointers to spell behavior routines?

name: Spell Pointer
comment: Spell index. This appears to be much longer (150+?) but the corresponding spell routine array isn't. I'm not sure the extra entries do anything useful.
